Sentencas: The durability of low-cost fuel cells is one of the last technical challenges to be overcome before the widespread adoption of fuel cells can become a reality.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests

Sentencas: Most research concentrates on polymer electrolyte membrane or solid oxide fuel cells in this topic with little published regarding the durability of recirculating liquid electrolyte alkaline fuel cells.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests

Sentencas: In this paper we present an investigation into the durability of this fuel cell variant under harsh load cycling, air starvation and fuel starvation conditions.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests

Sentencas: In the study, making use of the high ionic conductivity of the electrolyte, a novel rig design was utilised, which allowed the surfaces of the electrodes to be constantly monitored optically during the experiments.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests

Sentencas: This demonstrated the good physical durability of the anode during the test protocols whilst highlighted the instability of the manganese-cobalt spinel cathode, used in this study, during the air starvation protocols.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests

Sentencas: The load cycling stability of the alkaline fuel cells used was found to be good with the standard configuration giving only around a 2.7% voltage degradation at 100 mA cm(-2) operating point over 8000 load cycles.
Titulo: In-operando optical observations of alkaline fuel cell electrode surfaces during harsh cycling tests
